text: The Lutheran Church of Rwanda (Itorero Ry' Abalutheri Ry' Urwanda, Église luthérienne du Rwanda) is a Lutheran denomination in Rwanda. It is a member of the Lutheran World Federation, which it joined in 2002. It is also a member of the Conseil protestant du Rwanda. == External links == *Lutheran World Federation listing Category:Lutheran denominations Category:Lutheranism in Africa Category:Rwanda stubs Category:Stub-Class Lutheranism articles Category:Lutheran World Federation members
title: Lutheran Church of Rwanda
